content: the sideways crochet jumper is a lovely fitting jumper designed in sizes from xs through to 5xl chest circumference from 76cm to 158cm it has been designed to an actual body measurement as the way it is worked and the stitch used create a stretchy fabric that contours the body the pattern is written in both uk and us crochet terms and contains schematics and links to a stitch video tutorial i used deramores anti-pilling studio aran yarn in marigold which is worsted weight/10-ply yarn and 5 5 mm crochet hook you will need between 960m-1970m of suitable yarn the pattern is also free on my linked blog
